turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, I would like to order two two small pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas it is. where should i place this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At Bella Luna, please. I would like to order one veggie lovers pizza extra artichokes, extra mushrooms, extra cheese and extra olives, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the new Pizza Rio Bella Luna. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got and for the other pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do a chicken Alfredo pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, bella luna doesn't have alfredo sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does Bella Luna have any other type of sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want something else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, marinara and bbq.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Well let's do a chicken barbecue with sausage added and jalapenos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: as well as mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fantastic, thank you. Yeah, I would love that. Thanks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, you're fantastic as always. Thanks. Awesome, I'm going to enjoy it so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order will b ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all. Thank you for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm so glad you'll enjoy that so much. take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
